level.heading: Rulemaking.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to title 1 of the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act, approved October 21, 1968 (82 Stat. 1204; § 2-501 et seq.), shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-351.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-56, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-351.01.
